title: Columbia Men's Tamiami Ii Long Sleeve Shirt
description: ADVANCED TECHNOLOGY: Columbia's PFG Tamiami Long Sleeve shirt features our signature UPF 40 fabric for maximum protection against UVA and UVB rays and our breathable wicking fabric that pulls moisture away to keep you cool and dry.
HANDY FEATURES: This men's Columbia PFG Tamiami long sleeve fishing shirt features two handy chest pockets for convenient storing and roll-up sleeves adjustable comfort.
COMFORT & BREATHABILITY: This long sleeve fishing shirt features a mesh-lined vented back for breathability and comfort.
CLASSIC FIT: With a modern classic fit, this long sleeve shirt is ultra-light and comfortable enough for maximum activity.

OMNI-SHADE: Be safe and protected. Omni-Shade blocks UVA and UVB rays to help prevent sunburns and long-term skin damage. The tight weave construction with UV absorbent yarns block the full spectrum of harmful UV rays.
